Package bacnet.datamodel.sequenceNCBI

Class GenomeConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • bacnet.datamodel.sequenceNCBI.GenomeConversion
  • public class GenomeConversion
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods for converting GenomeNCBI to Genome
    Genome is used for fast loading of all genomic information we gathered
    Author:
    UIBC

      Constructor Description
      GenomeConversion()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private static void convertGenes​(Genome genome, GenomeNCBI genomeNCBI, java.lang.String pathSequences)
      Go through all chromosomes and all Coding region of GenomeNCBI
      Convert all DNASequence into Gene
      Add the result to Genome
      private static void convertNcRNA​(Genome genome, GenomeNCBI genomeNCBI, java.lang.String pathSequences)
      Go through all chromosomes and all NonCoding regions of GenomeNCBI
      Convert all DNASequence into Gene
      Add the result to Genome
      private static void correctGeneName​(Gene gene, java.lang.String[][] correctGenesArray)
      Some Gene name are associated to multiple lmo locus, with this function we delete gene name if necessary
      static void createAnnotation​(Genome genome, java.lang.String path)
      Create a Table with all elements of the Genome, which will be used for element search and display on the GenomeViewer
      static void createFolderCopyFNA​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String pathNCBI)
      Create a folder for each Genome, and copy all .fna in it
      static Genome run​(GenomeNCBI genomeNCBI, java.lang.String pathGenome, java.lang.String genomeName)
      Method for Genome already load

      Convert a GenomeNCBI into a Genome object -> convert each ChromosomeBacteriaSequence into Chromosome:
      each chromosome sequence are the same coding and noncoding DNASequence are convert into Gene and NcRNA and serialized sRNA are leaved unchanged Operons, terminator and other elements are serialized Annotation is created, saved in a table (only for verification) and serialized
      static Genome run​(GenomeNCBI genomeNCBI, java.lang.String pathGenome, java.lang.String genomeName, java.lang.String genomePath)
      Method for Genome already load

      Convert a GenomeNCBI into a Genome object -> convert each ChromosomeBacteriaSequence into Chromosome:
      each chromosome sequence are the same coding and noncoding DNASequence are convert into Gene and NcRNA and serialized sRNA are leaved unchanged Operons, terminator and other elements are serialized Annotation is created, saved in a table (only for verification) and serialized
      static Genome run​(java.lang.String genomeName)
      Method for Genome in the GenomeNCBIFolder

      Convert a GenomeNCBI into a Genome object -> convert each ChromosomeBacteriaSequence into Chromosome:
      each chromosome sequence are the same coding and noncoding DNASequence are convert into Gene and NcRNA and serialized sRNA are leaved unchanged Operons, terminator and other elements are serialized Annotation is created, saved in a table (only for verification) and serialized
      private static void serializeOtherElements​(Genome genome, GenomeNCBI genomeNCBI, java.lang.String pathSequences)
      Get all elements except Coding and NonCoding serialize them, and put them in Chromosome
      static void updateAllElements​(Genome genome)
      Add all elements found in the Chromosome to LinkedHashMap allElements

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static Genome run​(java.lang.String genomeName)
        Method for Genome in the GenomeNCBIFolder

        Convert a GenomeNCBI into a Genome object -> convert each ChromosomeBacteriaSequence into Chromosome:
        each chromosome sequence are the same coding and noncoding DNASequence are convert into Gene and NcRNA and serialized sRNA are leaved unchanged Operons, terminator and other elements are serialized Annotation is created, saved in a table (only for verification) and serialized
        Parameters:
        genomeNCBI -
        genomeName -

      • run

        public static Genome run​(GenomeNCBI genomeNCBI,
                         java.lang.String pathGenome,
                         java.lang.String genomeName)
        Method for Genome already load

        Convert a GenomeNCBI into a Genome object -> convert each ChromosomeBacteriaSequence into Chromosome:
        each chromosome sequence are the same coding and noncoding DNASequence are convert into Gene and NcRNA and serialized sRNA are leaved unchanged Operons, terminator and other elements are serialized Annotation is created, saved in a table (only for verification) and serialized
        Parameters:
        genomeNCBI - already load GenomeNCBI
        pathGenome - path where .fna files are
        genomeName - final genome name

      • run

        public static Genome run​(GenomeNCBI genomeNCBI,
                         java.lang.String pathGenome,
                         java.lang.String genomeName,
                         java.lang.String genomePath)
        Method for Genome already load

        Convert a GenomeNCBI into a Genome object -> convert each ChromosomeBacteriaSequence into Chromosome:
        each chromosome sequence are the same coding and noncoding DNASequence are convert into Gene and NcRNA and serialized sRNA are leaved unchanged Operons, terminator and other elements are serialized Annotation is created, saved in a table (only for verification) and serialized
        Parameters:
        genomeNCBI - already load GenomeNCBI
        pathGenome - path where .fna files are
        genomeName - final genome name
        genomePath - should have genomePath = Project.getGENOMES()+genomeName;

        Convert all DNASequence into Gene
        Add the result to Genome

        genomeNCBI -

        Parameters:
